4804.TWO.long_name: Da Lue International Holding Company Limited
4804.TWO.summary: Da Lue International Holding Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various wedding services in China. The company offers wedding planning, witnesses ceremony, and wedding dress rental services, as well as wedding photography and video, and other wedding-related services; and wedding banquet, and conference and exhibition services It is also involved in the rental and sale of clothing and flowers, operation of hotels, and real estate business. In addition, the company offers catering and catering management services; and technology development, technical consulting, and other services in the field of network technology. The company's brand portfolio includes Victoria Wedding Club, Coloration LISA Wedding Photography, Taiwan North Suoluo Wedding Photography, Jennifer Wedding Photography, Princess Wedding Photography, Pujue Hotel, and Vienna Hotel. Da Lue International Holding Company Limited was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
